description.raw:
Otherwise the `BUILD_TYPE` parameter is not used.

I noticed this while trying to confirm a windows warning when using `RelWithDebInfo`. I passed `RelWithDebInfo` as the `BUILD_TYPE` to the following tests, which I expect to cause a linker warning that gets flagged as a compiler warning:

* default branch of release-tools: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64&build=11)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64/11/) doesn't have the warning because it is actually using `Release`

* this branch of release-tools: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64&build=12)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-ign-math4-windows7-amd64/12/) has the expected warning
description.html:
Otherwise the BUILD_TYPE parameter is not used.

I noticed this while trying to confirm a windows warning when using RelWithDebInfo. I passed RelWithDebInfo as the BUILD_TYPE to the following tests, which I expect to cause a linker warning that gets flagged as a compiler warning:

  • default branch of release-tools: doesn't have the warning because it is actually using Release

  • this branch of release-tools: has the expected warning
